qolmat.imputations.rpca.rpca.RPCA¶

class qolmat.imputations.rpca.rpca.RPCA(period: Optional[int] = None, max_iter: int = 10000, tol: float = 1e-06)[source]¶

This class is the root class of the RPCA methods.

Parameters:
n_rows: Optional[int]

Number of rows of the array if the array is 1D and reshaped into a 2D array, by default ``None`.

max_iter: int

maximum number of iterations of the alternating direction method of multipliers, by default 1e4.

tol: float

Tolerance for stopping criteria, by default 1e-6

verbose: bool

default False

Methods

fit_transform(X[, y])

Fit to data, then transform it.

get_params([deep])

Get parameters for this estimator.

set_params(**params)

Set the parameters of this estimator.
